## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code compiles without TypeScript errors
- [ ] My code passes ESLint (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Algorithm logic is in `/lib/algorithms/`, not in components
- [ ] I used semantic color variables (not hardcoded colors)

### Testing
- [ ] I tested locally with `npm run dev`
- [ ] I tested with minimum input size
- [ ] I tested with maximum input size
- [ ] I tested edge cases (empty, sorted, single element)

### Documentation
- [ ] I updated the README if adding a new algorithm
- [ ] I followed patterns in CONTRIBUTING.md
